transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Yes.

Customer: Sir, main IndiaMART se baat kar raha hu sir. How are you sir?

Customer: Good sir, good.

Executive: Sir, aapki site se ek concern raise hua tha IndiaMART mein kal ki date mein. Jisme aapne concern raise kiya tha sir ki aapko jo aapki site se ek koi link aa raha hai IndiaMART ki site se. To isliye maine call kiya tha sir jo aap mujhe please bataiye sir kis source se aapke paas lead link aa rahi hai aur kaun sa link aa raha hai sir?

Customer: Link aa raha tha sir kya bolte hai usko, ye feedback form bolke ek aa raha tha ki mera number change ho gaya hai aisa aisa karke.

Executive: Achcha aapka number change ho gaya hai aapke paas ek feedback form aaya tha is matlab.

Customer: Haan, haan, haan.

Executive: Is date mein aapke paas ek lead aayi thi is mail aaya tha sir?

Customer: Kal aaya tha sir.

Executive: Kal ki date mein.

Executive: Okay. To aapka ye number added tha IndiaMART mein?

Customer: Ye number mera add hai IndiaMART mein.

Executive: Achcha ye change ho gaya hai sir aur isme 84 ka number jo hai na ye ye number added hai yaha pe. Ya aapke triple two karke jo number hai ye number added hai yaha pe. To ye change ho gaya hai change kiya hoga aapke yaha pe.

Customer: Haan, wo koi baat nahi hai.

Executive: Theek hai. To aur koi concern hai sir aapka?

Customer: Nahi nahi yahi puch raha tha ki jo call aa raha tha fake call tha na right call tha?

Executive: Nahi nahi right call right call aapke paas aayi thi. Ye mail aaya tha.

Customer: Hmm mere paas call aa rahi thi. Unhone bola main ek link bheja hu feedback indiamart.in ke naam se.

Executive: Ek second. Likha hua hai isme thank you for valuable feedback for IndiaMART. Click here to express your experience in this one minute survey rate as per your experience between one to five star rating for better service and upgrade your for future.

Executive: Sir, ek baar aap mujhe wo forward kar sakte hai sir agar possible ho to?

Customer: Haan boliye number boliye.

Executive: Isi number pe aap forward kar dijiye.

Customer: Is number pe ek second ruko aapko abhi bata raha hu.

Customer: I think ye fake hai iske wajah se hi maine use rakha. Kyunki unka call jo hai matlab ek minute mein char baar aa gaya maine socha yaar kya baat hai. Bas uske baad maine call kar diya IndiaMART pe.

Customer: Ye whatsapp number hai?

Executive: Ji ji ye whatsapp number hai isko bhi check kar lete hai.

Customer: Ab dekho main aapko dikhata hu.

Customer: Ye dekhiye first.

Customer: Dikh raha hai?

Executive: Haan dikh raha hai.

Customer: Second feedback. Ye I think mere ko lag raha hai fraud hai.

Executive: Theek hai aap mujhe thoda time dijiye main aapko abhi update karta hu sir. Kuch der mein call back karta hu sir.

Customer: Please mere ko iska inform karo theek hai mere ko to fir isko matlab ye karna padega na complain karna padega is number pe.

Executive: Bilkul main aapko abhi inform kar raha hu sir kuch der mein isko main back end team. Ye dekh lo main details sari details share kar raha hu aapko ye dekh lo.

Customer: Anjali Agarwal ek second main abhi check hi karta hu.

Executive: Ek baar kis number se message aaya wo number bataiye sir ek baar.

Customer: Ye number bheja hai sir maine dekho message.

Customer: Haan haan usi number se call bhi usi number se aa raha hai message bhi usi number se aa raha hai. 910 ek second main check kar leta hu. 910

Executive: Mail bhi aapke paas aaya tha kya is type ka?

Customer: Mail ka to maine check nahi kiya mere ko call kiya tha inhone bas itna hi mere ko pata hai abhi. 51

Customer: Theek hai main rakh raha hu sir mere ko call aa raha hai theek hai.

Executive: Theek hai main abhi aapko update karta hu sir kuch time mein theek hai. Please message kar do ya kuch bhi karo mere ko main fir iske against ye karunga theek hai sir.

Executive: Main aapko ek baar call kar lunga sir. The Great Speaking Web has put your call on hold.
summary:
Concerns:

- Received a fake call and link.

- Number change feedback form received.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to forward the message.

- Executive assured to check and inform.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back the customer.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- fake call, fraud, feedback, link
